articles.title: IISc team develops 3D system that replicates lungs | Bengaluru News - The Times of India
articles.description: In a breakthrough for TB research, IISc scientists create a 3D hydrogel culture system mimicking human lungs. This innovative model enhances study of TB bacteria infection and drug efficacy for better treatments. Learn more!
